DOC.brief_title: Efficacy High-oleic Canola Flaxseed Oils Hypercholesterolemia Cardiovascular Disease Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: Fasting serum LDLCholesterol > 3.0 mmol/L Body mass index ( BMI ) 2236 kg/m2 smoking use lipid lower therapy document cardiovascular/atherosclerotic disease inflammatory disease diabetes uncontrolled hypertension kidney disease systemic diseases cancer chronic alcohol consumption ( > 2 servings/day ) excessive exercise expenditure ( > 4000 kcal/week )
